hero.title: Jonathan Arias
hero.description: I transform ideas into robust, interactive, and high-performance web applications, integrating AI solutions and n8n automations. I have more than 4 years of experience building scalable digital products for clients and high-impact teams.

1.title: Income & Expenses
1.description: Personal finance app with interactive charts (Victory), localStorage persistence, JSON/CSV export, and responsive design with Tailwind CSS.

2.title: My Portfolio
2.description: My first personal portfolio built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring a dark theme design with about, skills, projects and contact sections.

3.title: Rick and Morty Explorer
3.description: One of my first personal projects: Rick and Morty character explorer consuming the public API, with search and filters.

experience.title: My Journey
experience.description: A journey through my professional experience and the projects that have marked my career

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Main stack · Frontend, Backend, AI and QA

achievements: Increased productivity by ~30% with HUB/CMS panels in React, Next.js and MUI, automating workflows and centralizing information
Designed autonomous AI agents with Python and Node.js to automate internal workflows (lead classification, intelligent data extraction from critical documents)
Led the design and implementation of cross-platform desktop applications in WhatsApp Web style using React and Electron, sharing logic with Next.js to maximize reuse
Built an end-to-end E-learning platform: UI conceptualization, student/teacher portals with progress tracking and evaluation systems
Implemented AI analytics dashboards with React and Mantine UI to monitor performance, token usage and satisfaction metrics in real-time
Reduced manual tickets by ~45% with AI support systems integrating OpenAI (GPT-4) and Anthropic (Claude) for automated contextual responses

Designed private messaging architecture (chat, voice, video) with WebRTC and Python, defining communication flows and scalability; adopted in web and mobile by institutions in Panama, Venezuela and Spain
Acted as Technical Lead coordinating multidisciplinary teams to bring architectural designs to production
Led technical recruitment of the full-stack team, designing challenges and interviews that resulted in hiring 6 developers
Integrated real-time state management and UI with Redux, Mantine and Socket.io for consistent experiences across global clients
Boosted conversions by ~40% and increased time on page by ~25% by developing high-performance landing pages with interactive animations
Architected and implemented MERN microservices following Clean Architecture principles for modularity, scalability and code reuse
Containerized applications with Docker to standardize distribution and deployment across multiple environments
Implemented secure authentication and RBAC systems aligned with Auth0 standards
Collaborated with design to deliver refined UI/UX, proposing look & feel improvements that increased engagement
Managed state and styles in complex applications using Redux, Tailwind CSS and SASS

contact.title: Let's Talk
contact.description: I'm available for new projects and collaborations. Don't hesitate to contact me to discuss how I can help you bring your ideas to life.
